text: Shikashi (kaiho suru dorei o) motanai-sha wa, ryonin ga katamini fureru mae ni, 2kagetsu tsudzukete saikai shi nasai. Sore o nashi enai mono wa, 60-ri no hinja ni shoku o atae nasai. Kore wa, anata gata ni arra to shito o shinji saseru tamedearu. Korera ga arra no okitedearu. Fushin-sha ni taishite wa itamashi chobatsu ga arou
